channel.title: I'm the first person to report a crash! Woohoo!!! :D
channel.description: Crash cherry. :3 Come on... you know you're smiling.... anyway, LOVING the game! Runs great! been playing for the last hour straight, I think I was being a little rough on the game. Attached print screen of error, and dump file. AWESOME JOB GUYS! ![crash.jpg|377x163](upload://tZkxdIwcNfMqTctc04APL3Syjd7.jpeg) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T18_24_54C0.mdmp (108 KB)

item.title: I'm the first person to report a crash! Woohoo!!! :D
item.dc:creator: unseenkiller
item.description:
I’ll be honest, mine happened the second I tried to load a level, and worked great the second I got back in game… wish I could help, but I didn’t do anything </3

Read full topic

item.title: I'm the first person to report a crash! Woohoo!!! :D
item.dc:creator: Kajshgfka
item.description:
I got this after getting in (what I call) The ‘super-tram’ (The larger one with the speed display in km/h) and driving on through to the next loading screen after having launched the rocket into space.

EDIT: I would really like a quick solution for this. I cannot progress any further and its bugging the hell out of me. I’ve already tried restarting steam and my computer altogether but to no avail.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm the first person to report a crash! Woohoo!!! :D

Crash cherry. :3

Come on… you know you’re smiling…

anyway, LOVING the game! Runs great! been playing for the last hour straight, I think I was being a little rough on the game. Attached print screen of error, and dump file.

AWESOME JOB GUYS!
